casebody.data:
PETER RUSTICI ET AL. v. DANNEL MALLOY ET AL. Andrew J. McDonald, corporation counsel, and Kenneth B. Povodator, assistant coiporation counsel, in support of the petition. *953Judith A. Mauzaka and Leon M. Rosenblatt, in opposition. Decided October 31, 2000

VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.
